text: Ki! Tomara to niscaya'i purusadera kache ese thaka, rajapathagulo bicchinna kare thaka, ara tomadera janasabhasamuhe jaghan'ya kaja kare thaka.’’ Kintu tamra lokadera uttara an'ya kichu chila na e bhinna ye tara balechila -- ''amadera upare allah‌ra sasti niye esa yadi tumi satyabadidera madhyekara ha'o.’’
